reviews.review:
To be honest, I did not expect this game to be this good. 

It has got a nice atmosphere, pretty cool electro soundtrack, funny little turrets saying "no hard feeling" - what else can you wish for? The game is entertaining and ironical. 
Glados is like a friendlier  funny version of Shodan. Puzzles are quire easy though. 


Anyways, I really recommend it. let's see if the second game is even better.

2007年的游戏能设计成这样真心不错。
尽管3D效果让人感到眩晕想吐，但是整体的设计思路很棒，跳出高度真是越高越不容易越让人头晕啊..
卡在最后一关很久，而且还要在限定的六分钟内完成似乎有些困难。
完成以后是真的有蛋糕的啊！
買就對了  好酷的遊戲體驗  還有神展開
挺好玩，但是。。。。。。。。呕

Amazing. This game brings you onto your edge, getting you to think about how to continue. This game has an amazing story, and gameplay. From challenging puzzles to creepy secrets, this game is worth buying. I recommend playing through portal 1 again, after beating Portal 2 to understand more on what is going on. Amazing game.
i love this game. i miss when games were this simple and still incredibly charming. if you havent played this for whatever reason you should probably do it right now. that is all.
A Gr8 mind boggling game

그냥 포탈건을 얻고 나서 부터 갓겜임을 알았다.
엄청난 갓겜이다.
JUST DO IT!
동행큐브가 말을 합니다
10/10 would get stuck in a level again

Criatividade é a palavra que define este jogo. Não apenas dos criadores e desenvolvedores, se você não pensar fora da caixa ficará preso nos primeiros niveis.  Ter uma visão aguçada e pensamentos rápidos são os verdadeiros requisitos para jogar Portal. A dificuldade aumenta a cada nivel na medida certa e as instruções são suficientes para nos dar o suporte necessário sem tirar de nós a chance de pensar para solucionar o problema. A história por tras dos desafios é cativante e o desenvolvimento envolvente. A voz robotica que te guia aos poucos cria um laço com você, para o bem ou para o mal. O desfecho e o zeramento, devo confessar, me levaram á lagrimas de tristeza e alegria.
Fantastic. Got it super cheap. Short game but definitely makes you think a little bit. Looking to play number 2 after this one
Świetna gra lecz krótka.
Consigliato a chi piacciono i rompicapi
gra jest fajna ale krótka i tak polecam
감자 도스의 초창기를  볼수 있는 게임

O jogo é bom, mas, comparando com o segundo, é meio fraco. Diferentemente de Portal 2, esse aqui é bem menor, mais limitado, mais bugado e mais simples, mesmo assim, é um jogo legalzinho, com alguns easter eggs interessantes, cumpre o que promete, é um bom passatempo pra exercitar o cérebro e divertidinho, porém, eu recomendo muito mais vc comprar o Portal 2, até pq ele tem o modo multiplayer.
A
只有2小時，但是超爽的

Есть капелька бреда но игра забавная!
Советую покупать по скидке!
Четко
游戏很好玩，玩法新颖，很难找到和传送门1类似的游戏，还有歌听，still alive~

Просто чудесная игра. Головоломки, оригинальная идея, немплохая графика (для 2007 года всё-таки), даже юмор местами – всё здесь. Наслаждплся каждым моментаом прохождения.
P.S.: на 19-м (последнем) уровне после момента с ракетой можно взять кубик с собой, он поможет вам расправиться с турелями позже =)

I bought the valve complete pack during the new chinese year celebration and I want to say that this game is fucking entertaining if you love puzzles. I don't have so much time for games, but I would definetly finish this and continue to portal 2. Big like for this game concept.
EDIT: I thought that it has more levels, but it was a really good game for less than 1$.
Тортик - это обман......

Yes. Buy it now. Ignore my play time on this account, I've played through it elsewhere. This is one of those classic games that you must play if you consider yourself a gamer. I love this game. My friends love this game. I don't really know anyone who doesn't like this game, unless you search out the reviews. Go on! Give it a shot! You might regret it if you don't.

Excellent  jeux !

Dommage que le jeu soit si cour on reste sur notre faim, mais franchement ce système de portail c'est vraiment bien pensé ! Combiner a la réflexion logique du joueur ! Génial.

Très bonne immersion, j’étais totalement plonger dans cet univers avec cette voix complètement barjo. J’adore !
Je déconseillerai au joueur qui n’aime pas trop ce prendre la tête à chercher des solutions même si ce n’est pas non plus très hard,
Mais sérieusement Vue le prix (en promo moins de 2€ je crois), ne pas hésiter !

Prochainement je vais acheter le 2 !!!!!!!!!!

9.8/10

Comprenlo, en este instante. Una verdadera obra maestra que perdura en el tiempo, lo único malo que tiene este juego es que termina.



[Completado en 2 horas.]

Zerei o modo história porém não terminei todos os bônus.

Basicamente Portal ( Ou Portal 1 ) é um jogo desenvolvido com a enfine Source de Ação e Estrategia, que em alguns níveis, é capaz de fazer sua cabeça doer e muito.. Porém, a história de portal / portal 2, pra mim, é uma das melhores do mundo dos games. 

Então basicamente, espera um sábado ou um domingo vai lá e compra portal, porque vai valer a pena...

Fun and amazing game. Only downside is how long the game is. Took me a day to complete the game. Otherwise, a legendary game. Edit* I experienced quite a bit of crashing while playing. It wasn't terrible due to how fast you can load this game back up.

Este juego es genial, una historia corta, pero para ser un juego del 2005 o eso creo, las graficas son geniales, lo mismo la historia, sabiendo que tiene el motor source, ademas el engine despues fue actualizado. buen juego y recomendado.
este juego salio en el 2007 y sigue siendo uno de los mejores juegos que puedes encontrar en steam

Bastante de pensar, la experiencia de juego es muy inmersiva, me encantó, y la dificultad de los desafíos es bastante alta, si te encanta obtener todos los logros de un juego, bajo mi criterio: tienes un reto grande en la cámara 16 en el desafío contrarreloj
nice and u have to think a lot

Hikaye kısmına değinirsek yeni çıkmış çoğu oyundan daha güzel bir senaryosu var. Bunun yanında oynanışı ile size gerçek özgürlüğün ne olduğunu güzel bir şekilde anlatacak. Oyunu bitirdiğiniz zaman size farklı meydan okumalar verecek, onlarda gerçekten çok keyifli.

Достоинства: Великолепный сюжет, напитанный загадками и философией, зрелищные окружения в ходе прохождения игры, невероятные музыкальные композиции.
Недостатки: Главная героиня всегда молчит 
В целом 10/10

I can't describe how it felt to play that game, there wasn't a single moment where it wasn't entertaining. This game is funny, ingenious and certainly original. I would give it 11/10 if that wasn't an overused joke.

Eine gute Story und nicht zu leichte Rätsel die ein aber nicht verzweifeln lassen?
Genau das bekommst du hier.
Indispensable en cualquier biblioteca de Steam 11/10
I want PORTAL 3 :c
Кубик жалко.
Good game

Sing all together -

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.

I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
for the people who are still alive.

Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE.
HAHA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
when there's Science to do.
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.

And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.

While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE
10/10

I know i'm 11 years late for the hype, but WOW. it's much better than I imagined! Thank god the only spoiler i know was the saying [spoiler]"The cake is a lie"[/spoiler] so I still could enjoy the game fully. Valve rly explored the possibility of the use of portal device, when trying to solve some harder puzzles i went "……OOH I didn't think it can be used like that!". And I didn't expect this after I finished the demo, but I actually gotten kinda attached to the voice.

前十几关让我以为这就是一个简单的小闯关游戏，使用传送门的新鲜元素来吸引人
玩到19关才感受到这个游戏的精妙之处，瞬间路转粉
[spoiler]卡关查攻略不存在的[/spoiler]

某天偶然在翻到了这款游戏，用了六小时通关。
开始玩续作的时候发现boss其实挺萌的，有点后悔杀掉她了_(:з」∠)_
[spoiler] 或者变成土豆更便于携带o(｀ω´ )o？[/spoiler]
然后直到今天打开准备些评测发现打折到三块钱，流下了悔恨的泪水
但是感觉不亏，三十六块钱能玩到十年前的佳作很满足ε-(´∀｀; )
[u]过每关的时候都有种我他娘的是个天才的错觉( ´▽` )ﾉ	[/u]
本当　素晴らしい作品ですね\(//∇//)\
十年前のゲームにとっては本当に最高だったd(^_^o）
I cried everytime I killed something even GLaDOS. That is all you need to know.
3块钱你买不了上当，你买不了吃亏啊。以前看的一篇文章，传送门发售时学生们请假回去玩？当时并不知道传送门是什么，但是从此在我心里留下了这个名字。后来有一天终于决定玩玩这款游戏，只可惜手残党被虐的欲仙欲死，看着攻略都过不了。
플탐이 너무 짧아요. 근데 돈값은 함
真的是非常出色而又有想法的游戏，传送门的感觉真是太奇妙了，三个小时通关，最后的歌真是太好听了。

[h1] Recenzja Gry Portal [/h1]

Portal To Gra "Puzzle", opierająca się na stawianu tytułowych portali, które umożliwiają przechodzenie poziomów. Wydana 10 października 2007 roku. Gra powstała na potrzeby pakietu "Orange Box", a potem jako oddzielna gra. Chociaż fabuła nie jest tak ciekawa od Portala 2, to nieźle można bawić się rozwiązując łamigłówki w grze. Opowiada o postaci "Chell", która zostaje wybudzona przez sztuczną inteligencję, "G.L.A.D.O.S.". W grze występuje niewielka ilość łamigłówek w porównaniu z następcą. 

Moim zdaniem jest to bardzo dobra gra. Osobiście, kupiłem ją w 2015 roku i bardzo mi się spodobała, chociaż pierwszą grą był u mnie Portal 2. [b] 8/10 [/b]
非常好玩的游戏

This is a neat puzzle game, which demands thinking and which diffculty does scale nicely. While the starting levels are fairly easy the more advanced levels and challenges are quite hard - took me a lot of tries till I got them right. 
The final boss can be a bit frustrating, [spoiler] since it requires good timing and aiming (and a bit of luck)	[/spoiler]

I personally didnt get that many hours out of the game, but it´s a great game to get when on discount.
Не плохая игра для убийства времени!
Ain't that obivous why this is postive??? Just buy the game already.

Восхетительная ига головоломка с глубоким и интересным сюжетом. Я ещё на впечетлениях от прохождения! Всем советую! Песня в конце просто огонь! Помню как давным давно мой папа (Он тоже любит эту игру) включал нам её

玩法新颖，设计精巧

Un clásico dentro de los clásicos hecho por la tan amada compañía Valve. Es un juego de puzzle bastante entretenido e incluso complicado de verdad que te puede dejar pensando por varios minutos. Con una historia que se va poniendo interesante a la vez que avanzas en el juego. Algo a destacar del mismo, es sin duda la comedia y su personaje GLaDOS que le agregan eso especial al juego. Aunque peor que su secuela, sigue siendo un buen juego bastante disfrutable. Recuerden que la torta es mentira...
